  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    dev.morphia.aggregation.Aggregation.addFields(AddFields)
    use Aggregation.pipeline(Stage...) instead
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Merge.into(Class<M>)
    use Merge.merge(Class)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Merge.into(String)
    use Merge.merge(String)
    dev.morphia.aggregation.stages.Merge.into(String, String)
    use Merge.merge(String, String)
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.addInterceptor(EntityListener<?>)
    use EntityListeners to define any lifecycle event listeners
    dev.morphia.mapping.PropertyDiscovery
    3.0 will evaluate both field and getter/setters for annotation so this setting becomes vestigial
    dev.morphia.query.OperationTarget
